name: Dont Let Shit Get You
description:
Don't Let Shit Get You
The game where you decide who shits and who don't.

Control who have access to the only latrine in town and fell the power of deciding if a person shit itself or not.

Game made in 48h for Ludum Dare #36 - ludum dare entry

A game by Matheus de Almeida
São Paulo - Brazil

github.com/temdisponivel

Engine: Unity3D

Source code available in: https://github.com/temdisponivel/Don-tLetTheShitGe...

All the art and sounds in this game weren't made by me, here are the following credits:
